name: Double Tower Cheeseburger
description: Two Flame-Grilled beef patties, two slices of American cheese, a heap of bacon, BBQ sauce, mayo and three crispy onion rings served in a sesame seed bun.

name: Bacon Double XL
description: Two flamed-grilled beef patties topped with Applewood smoked bacon and American cheese, all in our toasted sesame seed bun.
allergens: wheat, sesame, celery, gluten, milk, eggs, soy

name: Kids Hamburger
description: Our original burger with ketchup served in a sesame seed bun.

name: Farmhouse Angus
description: A flame-grilled Angus Beef Patty, toasted onion mayo, crispy bacon, oak-smoked cheddar cheese, rocket and pink pickled onions sandwiched between a soft brioche bun. You'd be barney not to try it.
allergens: wheat, sesame, celery, gluten, milk, eggs, soy

name: French Veggie Burger
description: Flame-grilled veggie hash, old-fashioned mustard sauce, crispy onions, arugula and slices of melted cheddar! Same process as the other products.
